description:
Allows switching the numpad between NVDA navigation mode, and Windows navigation mode.
Especially useful if migrating from Jaws; or for laptop users preferring laptop mode, but who have a numpad and want to use it for arrow keys, etc.
The add-on also gives control of numlock state when starting NVDA or changing profiles.

translations.description:
Позволява превключване на цифровата клавиатура между режима на навигация на NVDA и режима на навигация на Windows.
Особено полезно, ако преминавате от JAWS. Или за потребители на лаптопи, предпочитащи лаптоп клавиатурната подредба, но които имат цифрова клавиатура и искат да я използват за навигация със стрелки и т.н.
Добавката също така дава контрол върху състоянието на Num Lock при стартиране на NVDA или при промяна на конфигурационния профил.

Allows switching the numpad between NVDA navigation mode, and Windows navigation mode.
Especially useful if migrating from Jaws; or for laptop users preferring laptop mode, but who have a numpad and want to use it for arrow keys, etc.
The add-on also gives control of numlock state when starting NVDA or changing profiles.

Permite alternar el bloque numérico entre el modo de navegación de NVDA y el modo de navegación de Windows.
Especialmente útil si se migra desde Jaws, o para usuarios de portátiles que prefieren el modo portátil, pero que tienen un bloque numérico y quieren usarlo para pulsar las flechas, etc.
El complemento también da control del estado del bloqueo numérico al arrancar NVDA o cuando se cambia de perfil.

Mahdollistaa laskinnäppäimistön vaihtamisen NVDA- ja Windows-navigointitilojen välillä.
Tämä on erittäin hyödyllistä JAWSista siirryttäessä tai kannettavien tietokoneiden käyttäjille, jotka käyttävät mieluummin kannettavan näppäimistöasettelua mutta joilla on laskinnäppäimistö ja haluavat käyttää sitä nuolinäppäimiä varten jne.
Lisäosa voi myös hallita Numlockin tilaa NVDA:ta käynnistettäessä tai profiilia vaihdettaessa.

Permet de basculer le pavé numérique entre le mode de navigation NVDA et le mode de navigation Windows.
Particulièrement utile si la migration est à partir de Jaws ; ou pour les utilisateurs d'ordinateurs portables préférant le mode ordinateur portable, mais qui disposent d'un pavé numérique et souhaitent l'utiliser pour les touches fléchées, etc.
L'extension permet également de contrôler l'état du verrouillage numérique lors du démarrage de NVDA ou des changements de profils.

Allows switching the numpad between NVDA navigation mode, and Windows navigation mode.
Especially useful if migrating from Jaws; or for laptop users preferring laptop mode, but who have a numpad and want to use it for arrow keys, etc.
The add-on also gives control of numlock state when starting NVDA or changing profiles.

Permite alternar o teclado numérico entre o modo de navegação NVDA e o modo de navegação Windows.
Especialmente útil se estiver a migrar do Jaws; ou para utilizadores de portáteis que preferem o modo portátil, mas que têm um teclado numérico e o querem usar para as teclas de setas, etc.
O add-on também permite controlar o estado do numlock ao iniciar o NVDA ou ao mudar de perfil.

Allows switching the numpad between NVDA navigation mode, and Windows navigation mode.
Especially useful if migrating from Jaws; or for laptop users preferring laptop mode, but who have a numpad and want to use it for arrow keys, etc.
The add-on also gives control of numlock state when starting NVDA or changing profiles.

Sayısal tuş takımının NVDA gezinme modu ile Windows gezinme modu arasında geçiş yapmasına olanak sağlar.
Özellikle Jaws'tan geçiş yapılıyorsa kullanışlıdır. Ayrıca dizüstü bilgisayar modunu tercih eden ancak sayısal tuş takımına sahip olan ve bunu ok tuşları vb. için kullanmak isteyen dizüstü bilgisayar kullanıcıları için de faydalıdır.
Eklenti aynı zamanda NVDA'yı başlatırken veya profilleri değiştirirken Numara kilidi durumunun kontrolünü de sağlar.

translations.displayName: Режим навігації за допомогою цифрової клавіатури
translations.description:

Especially useful if migrating from Jaws; or for laptop users preferring laptop mode, but who have a numpad and want to use it for arrow keys, etc.
The add-on also gives control of numlock state when starting NVDA or changing profiles.

Allows switching the numpad between NVDA navigation mode, and Windows navigation mode.
Especially useful if migrating from Jaws; or for laptop users preferring laptop mode, but who have a numpad and want to use it for arrow keys, etc.
The add-on also gives control of numlock state when starting NVDA or changing profiles.
